title.name: A Call into the Void
title.flavour text: The dreaming [[cockerel]] crows thrice, and thunder bellows from the void.

title.name: A Dishonourable Death
title.flavour text: The dishonoured niece of the king is decisively laid to rest by her own bite.

title.name: A Dishonourable Death
title.flavour text: The dishonoured niece of the king is decisively laid to rest by her own bite.

title.name: A Firm Foothold
title.flavour text: Water slicks the stone, a misstep chills the bone, the living pools hold the cure.

title.name: A Forest of False Idols
title.flavour text: A grove of wooden faces spit fire, a cheap mockery of unimaginable power.

title.name: A Gracious Master
title.flavour text: A desperate ally seeks your aid, and will lavish you with appreciation.

title.name: A Master Seeks Help
title.flavour text: Blind to all but gold, a master treasure hunter seeks aid.

title.name: A Master Seeks Help
title.flavour text: Lost in the miasma of dream, a master of many realms seeks aid.

title.name: A Master Seeks Help
title.flavour text: Maniacally digging in endless darkness, a master miner seeks aid.

title.name: A Master Seeks Help
title.flavour text: Prognosticating impending doom, a master survivalist seeks aid.

title.name: A Master Seeks Help
title.flavour text: Pursuing a world of perfect balance, a veiled master seeks aid.

title.name: A Prodigious Hand
title.flavour text: The dead one brought back to life by means other than corruption now holds the hands that revived it.

title.name: A Regal Death
title.flavour text: Blue blood drains from a cut-throat, and turns what it touches to gold.

title.name: A Rift in Time
title.flavour text: The rift is torn open, and time's clasp is twisted.

title.name: A Valuable Combination
title.flavour text: When the sum is already greater than the parts, there is room to make it greater still.

title.name: A Vision of Ice and Fire
title.flavour text: Where the river meets the sea, the flames meet winter's chill, and heated battle sends a shiver down a twisted spine.

title.name: A Whispered Prayer
title.flavour text: A preacher whispers to the skies and the skies answer with a blanket of biting frost.

title.name: Abnormal Effulgence
title.flavour text: Living stone and effulgence, nothing moves unhindered beneath the weight of its dark presence.

title.name: Against the Tide
title.flavour text: Taken by the fickle tides, the Captain's bow washes against the dock from which he set sail.

title.name: Agony at Dusk
title.flavour text: In the beast's belly, the Inquisitor hunts the dying light.

title.name: An Unseen Peril
title.flavour text: A trap is set, a lure is placed, but stronger foes lie in wait.

title.name: Anarchy's End I
title.flavour text: A criminal of Theopolis flees into dream carrying a fortuneteller's tool.

title.name: Anarchy's End II
title.flavour text: Two criminals carry the fortuneteller's tools as they hunt for the body of their dreaming ally.

title.name: Anarchy's End III
title.flavour text: A party of four criminals, each with the mark of the fortuneteller, hunt through dreams for their prosecutor.

title.name: Anarchy's End IV
title.flavour text: Six criminals take to foot to stamp out the threat that tracks them through dreams.

title.name: Ancient Doom
title.flavour text: Doom grows at the apex of the pyramid.

title.name: Ancient Rivalries I
title.flavour text: Her greatest creation failed her. The Aesthete seeks to punish the brute.

title.name: Ancient Rivalries II
title.flavour text: Burned at the stake, the Tongueless Witch seeks to purify the purifier.

title.name: Ancient Rivalries III
title.flavour text: Cut down on the shores, the Lion's fangs will sink into the Betraying King's flesh one last time.

title.name: Ancient Rivalries IV
title.flavour text: The Soulless One tore the world asunder, but the Poet will have the final word.

title.name: Baptism by Death
title.flavour text: The bishop's flock is long gone, yet still he wields his hefty crook.

title.name: Battle Hardened
title.flavour text: The eager warrior meets the Tyrant in battle. Outmatched and outwitted; he uses his strength to best his foe.

title.name: Beyond Sight I
title.flavour text: A dark presence hides just out of sight. Only bodies betray its movements.

title.name: Beyond Sight II
title.flavour text: A visible following forms around an invisible foe. It grows greater yet remains veiled.

title.name: Beyond Sight III
title.flavour text: Monsters not of this world spill forth. Only shapes and movement. A warped vision.

title.name: Beyond Sight IV
title.flavour text: My vision grows dark. A horror draws near. Its soul would be a treasured prize for Hinekora.

title.name: Black Devotion
title.flavour text: The Black Prayer falls silent in the face of the Archbishop's shimmering devotion.

title.name: Blind Faith
title.flavour text: Two sides, light and dark, collide, and leave all but one blind.

title.name: Blinding Light
title.flavour text: The light fades from one source but grows in another, blinding those who approach.

title.name: Blood in the Eyes
title.flavour text: Blood stains the fighter's eyes and rains upon the dirt. He sees and dreams in crimson.

title.name: Blood of the Betrayed
title.flavour text: Slain by their king, they live only in memory, but their lust for blood remains unsated.

title.name: Bountiful Traps
title.flavour text: In a distant dream, six traps with the promise of treasure wait to be sprung.

title.name: Brothers in Arms
title.flavour text: Two men, transformed into monsters, fight together to hold the gate.

title.name: Burning Dread
title.flavour text: The Empyrian faces her dread and perishes; her arc now complete.

title.name: Cleanser of Sins
title.flavour text: The Evangelist does not practise what he preaches, but death wipes clean the slate.

title.name: Cold Blooded Fury
title.flavour text: Winter weaves the cannibal's cold fury until his blood boils over.

title.name: Cold Greed
title.flavour text: Avarice turns the heart as cold as a fragment of Winter itself.

title.name: Crescent Splinter
title.flavour text: Precious and perilous, Tantalising and terrible.

title.name: Crimson Hues
title.flavour text: The ruins hide an artist whose own crimson ink coats the stone.

title.name: Crushing Squall
title.flavour text: The sky trembles and the ground below answers with crushing force.

title.name: Crystalline Geode
title.flavour text: A fractured lithophysa studded with delicate crystalline formations.

title.name: Custodians of Silence
title.flavour text: The temple untouched for centuries, the guardians clean and pure, yet they too must meet the Mother.

title.name: Dance of Steel
title.flavour text: A soul of steel shatters, and a spinning shard joins the eternal dance.

title.name: Dark Instincts
title.flavour text: Guided by luck, the fox hunts the spider in absolute shadow.

title.name: Darktongue's Shriek
title.flavour text: Where the dead still rest, the defiler's scream bellows through the tombs before falling eternally silent.

title.name: Day of Sacrifice I
title.flavour text: The ancient red champion is fallen, but a killing blow reveals his final sacrifice beneath the morning sun.

title.name: Day of Sacrifice II
title.flavour text: Beneath the midday sun, treasure, stained by corruption, invites an ambush.

title.name: Day of Sacrifice III
title.flavour text: The ancient red army opens a powerful path before the setting sun.

title.name: Day of Sacrifice IV
title.flavour text: A corrupted dream invites an invader, who hunts in the deepest night.

title.name: Deadly Rivalry I
title.flavour text: You draw the ire of another, imbued with golden power.

title.name: Deadly Rivalry II
title.flavour text: Their defeat will not stand, renewed and fueled by blind rage.

title.name: Deadly Rivalry III
title.flavour text: Their body broken and mended, now a conduit for a greater power.

title.name: Deadly Rivalry IV
title.flavour text: Prayer at a dark altar mends torn flesh once again, but darkness still fills the soul. Each defeat feeds their determination.

title.name: Deadly Rivalry V
title.flavour text: Allies arrive for a final battle, filled with shared blood. The breaking and mending takes its toll.

title.name: Deadly Twins
title.flavour text: In a long-lost dream, one deadly foe becomes two.

title.name: Defiled in the Sceptre
title.flavour text: Stolen from their homes, innocent flesh is twisted and shaped atop the tower.

title.name: Dying Cry
title.flavour text: The bell tolls, the people gather, the General is executed. The militia cries out and charges forth.

title.name: Echoes of Lost Love
title.flavour text: Twisted by temptation, tempted by corruption, the Siren's song finally calls forth a fragment of her lost love.

title.name: Echoes of Mutation
title.flavour text: Perverse loyalty, blind love, the abuser and the abused reunited in sin.

title.name: Echoes of Witchcraft
title.flavour text: A circle of silent giants imprisons a memory of undying misery. A dark tongue whispers dark words carried by the western winds.

title.name: End of the Light
title.flavour text: The king rots in his frozen tomb, atop the island of his own creation.

title.name: Ending the Torment
title.flavour text: A fearsome foe's inner torment spills out into the world.

title.name: Erased from Memory
title.flavour text: A foe feared for an aeon falls and is scoured from the pages of history.

title.name: Erasmus' Gift
title.flavour text: The kind gemcutter scattered his beautiful craft for the paupers, but greedy hands hide them.

title.name: Faith Exhumed
title.flavour text: The lost lover returns, but faith releases him from his service.

title.name: Fallow At Last
title.flavour text: The farmer's time came long ago, his ruined home the site of a dark harvest.

title.name: Fated Connections
title.flavour text: Five and fewer stand alone, but six draws them together.

title.name: Fear's Wide Reach
title.flavour text: The unseen enemy travels through unseen tunnels. Its reach is small, but its effect is large.

title.name: Fire and Brimstone
title.flavour text: Living cinders set the stone alight, a gleaming signal in the blackness where husks are burned.

title.name: Fire and Ice
title.flavour text: Cold sorrow turns to burning fury that hails across the shattered ship.

title.name: Fire from the Sky
title.flavour text: Fire rains down across the land. Beware the path you take.

title.name: Fire, Wood and Stone
title.flavour text: With crushing weight, the stone figure roams the halls. It burns eternally yet grows no lighter.

title.name: Flesh of the Beast
title.flavour text: Stripped of its flesh, a warrior fights to protect the piece of the beast it has carved.

title.name: Forceful Exorcism
title.flavour text: A pained spirit hijacks a body, and will not be stopped by that body's demise.

title.name: From Death Springs Life
title.flavour text: Fetid waters carry the dead downstream, but walking in the mud, the dead one carries life.

title.name: From The Void
title.flavour text: The iron heart, burned in the blackness of the void that lies beyond sight, rots all it touches.

title.name: Gilded Within
title.flavour text: Gold without, gold within. Blood comes in many colours, but the gilded always bleed gold.

title.name: Golden Touch
title.flavour text: Blue tendrils entangle and change. All that remains is gold.

title.name: Graceful Flames
title.flavour text: Crimson fabric flutters with fury and flame, but a gilded prize lies within.

title.name: Greed's Folly
title.flavour text: A trap of greed is laid in the Vault, and sprung at its heart by a wonder.

title.name: Heart of the Fire
title.flavour text: Its one desire is to see the world burn. A shard of fury stokes the undying fire in its heart.

title.name: Heavy Blows
title.flavour text: Living stone strides across the field, each step shakes the earth and rattles the soul.

title.name: Hidden Reinforcements
title.flavour text: Cowardly foes lay in wait. A show of force reveals their true intentions.

title.name: Hidden Vaal Pathways
title.flavour text: Ancient foes open new paths to the land they left barren.

title.name: Holding the Bridge
title.flavour text: Where those in black swarm across the stone steps, one's blood runs cold with hatred and one's eyes crackle with wrath.

title.name: Hunter's Lesson
title.flavour text: An adversary, slain, briefly lives on in the lessons taught to the slayer.

title.name: Ice from Above
title.flavour text: The cold blusters from above, chilling the unwary to the bone.

title.name: Igneous Geode
title.flavour text: Dark as obsidian with a red-hot core, the geode hums with mysterious energy.

title.name: In the Grasp of Corruption
title.flavour text: A soldier in black's journey is cut short at the foot of the tower. The flesh rots, but the bone grows yet.

title.name: Kalandra's Craft
title.flavour text: A grand treasure fractures like a dropped mirror, yet somehow goes unharmed.

title.name: Last of the Wildmen
title.flavour text: The Master's blade strikes the ground, and his body briskly follows. The line of the Wild Men ends.

title.name: Lasting Impressions
title.flavour text: A hand scrawls on a wall, or carves into bone, a tale that undoes the world and teaches those who come after.

title.name: Lightning Falls
title.flavour text: The storms above strike with precision. A deft foot will avoid the blows.

title.name: Living Fires
title.flavour text: Where the sand meets the water, the flesheater's flames shine brighter and brighter still.

title.name: Lost in the Pages
title.flavour text: Hundreds of years with nothing but books twists a once great mind.

title.name: Monstrous Treasure
title.flavour text: In a long lost dream, great foes hide in tiny boxes, but so do great rewards.

title.name: Mouth of Horrors
title.flavour text: The vile witch whispers words of horror, and sups from the chalice one final time.

title.name: Mysterious Invaders
title.flavour text: Beyond the golden gears, the edges of reality crack, and something hidden from sight spills through.

title.name: Mysterious Invaders
title.flavour text: Beyond the golden gears, the edges of reality crack, and something hidden from sight spills through.

title.name: Mysterious Invaders
title.flavour text: Beyond the golden gears, the edges of reality crack, and something hidden from sight spills through.

title.name: Mysterious Invaders
title.flavour text: Beyond the golden gears, the edges of reality crack, and something hidden from sight spills through.

title.name: Mysterious Invaders
title.flavour text: Beyond the golden gears, the edges of reality crack, and something hidden from sight spills through.

title.name: Nature's Resilience
title.flavour text: Thieves camp beneath roadside trees, but it is their leader who falls like the mighty oak.

title.name: Nemesis of Greed
title.flavour text: A collector of antiquities doubles their treasures, relinquishing them only with their final breath.

title.name: Notched Flesh
title.flavour text: Stiff is the bow. Brittle is the flesh that holds it. Deep are the holes it leaves.

title.name: Overflowing Riches
title.flavour text: A full pocket, severed, spills forth like a struck spring.

title.name: Path of Betrayal
title.flavour text: Cut down by the king's hand, southern spirits linger near the bones of giants.

title.name: Plague of Frogs
title.flavour text: Wet and slippery flesh, clinging feet and tongue. No matter the colour before, now the earth is green.

title.name: Plague of Rats
title.flavour text: They run, they bite, they flee, they die. Swarms of fur and teeth and tail drown each and every room.

title.name: Pleasure and Pain
title.flavour text: A single thorn slips through stretched skin; pain turns to power.

title.name: Pools of Wealth
title.flavour text: Beckoned by the Siren's song, wrathful gold rises from the ground.

title.name: Possessed Foe
title.flavour text: A name remembered all this time, their will stolen by a vengeful spirit.

title.name: Power Magnified
title.flavour text: The pious grow powerful surrounded by a sea of blood and empty husks

title.name: Rebirth
title.flavour text: An ordinary life, an ordinary death, marked by an extraordinary rebirth.

title.name: Reforged Bonds
title.flavour text: A bond of blood breaks, but from the carnage new bonds may be formed.

title.name: Resistant to Change
title.flavour text: Wreathed in blue sinew, it is protected from the flames, the storms and the snow alike.

title.name: Risen Blood
title.flavour text: Life flows through the blood. Let slip the blood, and the life will continue in a new form.

title.name: Roth's Legacy
title.flavour text: The devotee holds a relic of the pirate's past, looted and lost for an age.

title.name: Severed Limbs
title.flavour text: A storm of stone stops when the last of the limbs are severed and blood flows no more.

title.name: Smothering Tendrils
title.flavour text: Blue tendrils wrap around the markings, constricting and smothering the stone beneath.

title.name: Soil, Worms and Blood
title.flavour text: The unliving crowd into the dwellings of unlikely allies.

title.name: Song of the Sekhema
title.flavour text: The Sekhema's whispers fight back the wind, leaving no mark remaining.

title.name: Storm on the Horizon
title.flavour text: The poacher's bowstring snaps like dry bone and crackles like thunder.

title.name: Storm on the Reef
title.flavour text: Lightning flashes overhead. Bloated bodies wash ashore. One stands, walks, and stretches its wing.

title.name: Strong as a Bull
title.flavour text: Strength to rival the Karui King charges through the Sword King's dream.

title.name: Sun's Punishment
title.flavour text: Death's dance with dawn leads to the midday sun, whose spiteful zenith burns indiscriminately.

title.name: Thaumaturgical History I
title.flavour text: The Aesthete's monstrous techniques are protected by the shadows.

title.name: Thaumaturgical History II
title.flavour text: The Tongueless Witch's words speak through the stone to desperate followers.

title.name: Thaumaturgical History III
title.flavour text: The Soulless One's gift to the Prodigy draws forth those who seek the same unnatural power.

title.name: Thaumaturgical History IV
title.flavour text: Where the Soulless One left his physical form behind, a dangerous new threat emerges.

title.name: The Aesthete's Spirit
title.flavour text: The echo of the Aesthete haunts her greatest creation, bestowing great powers once more.

title.name: The Alchemist
title.flavour text: A fool tries to turn lead to gold, but a deft hand takes it by force.

title.name: The Ambitious Bandit I
title.flavour text: A bandit's ambition grows, and so too does the path it walks.

title.name: The Ambitious Bandit II
title.flavour text: A bandit seeks a relic for the greedy where greed was once a great virtue.

title.name: The Ambitious Bandit III
title.flavour text: Where relics and tomes gather dust, a bandit's eyes see great value.

title.name: The Apex Predator
title.flavour text: The eagle battles the vulture in the shadow of a dying sun, and becomes something greater.

title.name: The Beautiful Guide
title.flavour text: A single tap from the chisel, and the guide's marks grow far clearer.

title.name: The Beginning and the End
title.flavour text: The archbishop plays witness to his own cold death and cremation.

title.name: The Bishop's Legacy
title.flavour text: The crest becomes a crown when placed upon the Bishop's brow.

title.name: The Blacksmith
title.flavour text: Long ago, a master of metal, now a shaper of fear. But his greatest tools remain.

title.name: The Bloody Flowers Redux
title.flavour text: Ezomyte banners flutter through the air as embellished monsters fall, a reenactment of the slave's final victory.

title.name: The Bowstring's Music
title.flavour text: The brittle archer's bow plays a song of death, but the harp sings a sweet masterpiece.

title.name: The Brothers of Necromancy
title.flavour text: Four of shared flesh and blood raise an army of borrowed blood and bone.

title.name: The Brutal Enforcer
title.flavour text: In a society that values violence, the violent rise through the ranks like oil through water.

title.name: The Child of Lunaris
title.flavour text: The light of Lunaris shines on her child who walks in stone shrine's ruins.

title.name: The Corrupt
title.flavour text: To plow a field, you need a tool. To harvest grain, you need a tool. To spread corruption, you need a tool.

title.name: The Cursed Choir
title.flavour text: The sea witch whispers sweet nothings, and calms the hearts of unlikely allies.

title.name: The Dreaded Rhoa
title.flavour text: The rhoa's rage builds and boils over; a feeling of dread envelops the crimson beak.

title.name: The Dream Trial
title.flavour text: The depths of a dream hide a gauntlet that sharpens the body and mind.

title.name: The Dreamer's Dream
title.flavour text: The greatest threat, deep in dream, holds the key to another world.

title.name: The Eagle's Cry
title.flavour text: A flightless fowl charges through rotten wooden ribs; its scream gives even the battle-hardened pause.

title.name: The Emperor's Trove
title.flavour text: Lost in his own creation, the Emperor leaves a generous parting gift for the precise.

title.name: The Fall of an Empire
title.flavour text: The Vaal's dark machinery was their greatest triumph, and its destruction another's destiny.

title.name: The Feral Lord I
title.flavour text: The Feral Lord in the southern wood twists the wild to his will.

title.name: The Feral Lord II
title.flavour text: The Feral Lord's cold breath imbues and empowers the beast in the northern wood.

title.name: The Feral Lord III
title.flavour text: Where water shimmers no more, thunderous beasts are dragged into the Feral Lord's domain.

title.name: The Feral Lord IV
title.flavour text: The Feral Lord senses your presence. In the shell of the snail, the vulture seeks a fresh carcass.

title.name: The Feral Lord V
title.flavour text: To the realm of dreams the Feral Lord flees, and leaves in his wake a burning nightmare.

title.name: The Flayed Man
title.flavour text: The flayed becomes the flayer, stripping flesh from muscle with a sharpened edge.

title.name: The Flow of Energy
title.flavour text: The Aesthete sustains herself in unnatural ways. When movement fails, energy flows.

title.name: The Forgotten Garrison
title.flavour text: Where bandits have taken hold, a lifeless army rises to guard the ruined fortress.

title.name: The Forgotten Soldiers
title.flavour text: The banner in the breeze marks the resting place of lions, whose metal fangs still thirst for blood.

title.name: The Fortune Teller's Collection
title.flavour text: The dreaming seeker finds what a fortune teller forgets.

title.name: The Four Feral Exiles
title.flavour text: In a faraway dream, four souls far from home prepare to fight to the death.

title.name: The God of Misfortune
title.flavour text: Pagan mouths worship pagan gods; false idols for false promises.

title.name: The Great Leader of the North
title.flavour text: The boulder is crushed atop the hill, letting the great leader's people pass.

title.name: The Great Mind of the North
title.flavour text: The Eternal servant bathes in his own blood, and a master tactician is born.

title.name: The Hardened Armour
title.flavour text: The rings that bind grow tighter, the plate thicker, the leather denser, all with a single touch.

title.name: The Hollow Pledge
title.flavour text: Grasping blindly through a dark dream, a final pledge turns brittle flesh to dust.

title.name: The Hungering Swarm
title.flavour text: Skittering across the ground, insects nest near unlikely allies.

title.name: The Invader
title.flavour text: A horror from the past returns to cause pain in a place that it never called home.

title.name: The Jeweller's Touch
title.flavour text: The Jeweller leaves five fingerprints and connects them with a single thread.

title.name: The Karui Rebellion
title.flavour text: Thaumaturgy and faith clash among giant ruins; a recreation of a long-gone rebellion.

title.name: The King and the Brambles
title.flavour text: The Blade King's blood feeds brambles that grow ever thicker.

title.name: The King's Path
title.flavour text: Madness feeds the King's fury in the raging mouth of the volcano. His last vision will be a sign.

title.name: The Lady in Black
title.flavour text: Lightning's hum grows louder and louder in the hands of the lady in black.

title.name: The Last Watch
title.flavour text: A loyal soldier in life, he stands watch, bow in hand, waiting to be sent to the Mother of death.

title.name: The Lost Maps
title.flavour text: A device of great power once held by the prodigy spills forth the keys to new worlds.

title.name: The Lost Undying
title.flavour text: Trapped with his emperor when the crown was taken, he seeks to change his fate.

title.name: The Malevolent Witch
title.flavour text: Silence and darkness harbour growing malevolence as the blood eater meets her maker.

title.name: The Mentor
title.flavour text: One falls, but another rises to lead.

title.name: The Misunderstood Queen
title.flavour text: A queen of bone raises an army and flees among walls of flesh.

title.name: The Mysterious Gift
title.flavour text: A merchant seeks to trade misfitting gifts. Five for one, but what is the one?

title.name: The Nest
title.flavour text: Rats become tangled in the spider's web; a meal within a nest within a dream.

title.name: The Nightmare Awakens
title.flavour text: The Eater has his final meal, and the Soulless One awakens.

title.name: The Petrified
title.flavour text: Lightless halls hewn in stone swell with the malformed, the twisted, the hardened and the dangerous.

title.name: The Plaguemaw I
title.flavour text: The Plaguemaw enters the red realm and leaves a swirling mass of living stone.

title.name: The Plaguemaw II
title.flavour text: The Plaguemaw's followers feed on the flesh of the dead; a desecration of the Mother's work.

title.name: The Plaguemaw III
title.flavour text: The Plaguemaw watches you with a glistening grin, waiting for a moment to send his shadows.

title.name: The Plaguemaw IV
title.flavour text: In a maze of green, the Plaguemaw sets a trap baited with treasures.

title.name: The Plaguemaw V
title.flavour text: A room, etched in crystal, plays home to the Plaguemaw. He awaits you.

title.name: The Prison Guard
title.flavour text: Clad in black, the guard holds the key to unleashing the storm.

title.name: The Prison Key
title.flavour text: The gate is unlocked, but the key remains in the hands of a devil.

title.name: The Queen's Sacrifice
title.flavour text: The ancient queen casts her gaze upon her reflection, and at last the curse is broken.

title.name: The Queen's Vaults
title.flavour text: The Red Queen holds the key to her vaults, and only death will loosen her grip.

title.name: The Scout
title.flavour text: One like you roams the land, but they are just the first of many.

title.name: The Servant's Heart
title.flavour text: The Servant's sacrifice summons a storm in the Prodigy's soul.

title.name: The Sharpened Blade
title.flavour text: The metal softens beneath the stone, reshaping with great ease.

title.name: The Silverwood
title.flavour text: A thief, bow in hand, flees to the wooded outskirts.

title.name: The Singular Spirit
title.flavour text: A life spent fleeing from the law leaves the spirit ready to escape with its newfound treasure.

title.name: The Sinner's Stone
title.flavour text: A lord of sin roams hollow halls protected from the spells he sings.

title.name: The Snuffed Flame
title.flavour text: Cold bones rattle in stone cells, extinguishing all light, all warmth, all hope.

title.name: The Soulless Beast
title.flavour text: Powered by twin wings, the mechanical monster roams the ruins.

title.name: The Stockkeeper
title.flavour text: A man survives only by his greed, but a single weapon cuts down the man who has many.

title.name: The Storm Spire
title.flavour text: Cold ocean winds whip across the sharp stones where two yet battle for control.

title.name: The Sword King's Passion
title.flavour text: Once a challenger to the crown, he holds in his hands the Sword King's blade.

title.name: The Trembling Earth
title.flavour text: The earth shifts beneath the feet of many, but they are not the prey this monster seeks.

title.name: The Twins
title.flavour text: What was one is now two. The strong find greater strength in numbers.

title.name: The Unbreathing Queen I
title.flavour text: The Unbreathing Queen masterminds an unholy heist, a defilement of the dead.

title.name: The Unbreathing Queen II
title.flavour text: The flesh is taken by the Unbreathing Queen. But the hero's soul, bitter and cold, remains trapped in the Emperor's greatest trial.

title.name: The Unbreathing Queen III
title.flavour text: Water crashes against stone; A victim of the Unbreathing Queen burns with desire for The Mother's domain.

title.name: The Unbreathing Queen IV
title.flavour text: A tangle of web trapped the body, now stolen. The Unbreathing Queen leaves behind a sorrowful soul whose howls thunder through the halls.

title.name: The Unbreathing Queen V
title.flavour text: The Unbreathing Queen raises an army in a dream of tombs and graves. She knows you are coming.

title.name: The Undead Brutes
title.flavour text: Powerful soldiers of a forgotten time reunite and march once again.

title.name: The Undead Storm
title.flavour text: Bones fall from the sky and take the shape of the men they once were.

title.name: The Vanguard
title.flavour text: The Vanguard lead the funereal march, playing hymns of death with their bowstrings.

title.name: The Walking Mountain
title.flavour text: Shaped by magic, the tool that breathes life into the titan's stone lies at its heart.

title.name: The Ward's Ward
title.flavour text: The false shaman's death uncovers ancestral allurement locked in ancient stone.

title.name: The Warmongers I
title.flavour text: A vanguard seeks to claim land that is not theirs.

title.name: The Warmongers II
title.flavour text: The vanguard did not return, so more have followed their path, bringing war with them.

title.name: The Warmongers III
title.flavour text: Failure twice draws the ire of higher ranking soldiers. They come to spill blood.

title.name: The Warmongers IV
title.flavour text: The leader arrives, and lays plans to paint the land red with your blood.

title.name: The Watcher's Watcher
title.flavour text: Unblinking, it watches. Unendingly, it is watched.

title.name: The Wealthy Exile
title.flavour text: They flee from the eyes of Oriath, coated in gold from head to toe.

title.name: Touched by the Wind
title.flavour text: Stitched with blue thread, a swift boot covers great distances.

title.name: Trapped in the Tower
title.flavour text: The Imperatrix traps her subjects in the shining sceptre, but it is she who becomes mired.

title.name: Trash to Treasure
title.flavour text: A blank canvas holds untold potential, but the artist's fortunate hand transforms it into a masterpiece.

title.name: Twice Enchanted
title.flavour text: A golden device hidden by a rotting emperor overflows with power.

title.name: Unbearable Whispers I
title.flavour text: Dark runes skitter across the pages of the tome, concealing the Whisperer's allies.

title.name: Unbearable Whispers II
title.flavour text: The Whisperer leaves a tome in the tower, held by a maddened follower.

title.name: Unbearable Whispers III
title.flavour text: The Aesthete holds the Whisperer's forbidden words safe, deep in the beast's belly.

title.name: Unbearable Whispers IV
title.flavour text: Forbidden words ring in the ears of the powerful; the Whisperer's influence spreads.

title.name: Unbearable Whispers V
title.flavour text: The trapped emperor unknowingly protects foul knowledge. Dark pages amongst bright treasures.

title.name: Undead Uprising
title.flavour text: The green and verdant field is swathed in night, the farmers who tended to it rise again.

title.name: Unnatural Energy
title.flavour text: Unnatural energies hold those in black at bay, but the barrier bends for crackling kin.

title.name: Vaal Invasion
title.flavour text: At the site of a great atrocity, the shadows of the distant past hang over the risen red army.

title.name: Vaal Winds
title.flavour text: Corruption is carried on a red wind, and spreads to all who are touched.

title.name: Vial of Awakening
title.flavour text: The eyes of Apep flicker open and the Poisoned One stirs.

title.name: Vial of Consequence
title.flavour text: Your actions live but a moment; their repercussions never die.

title.name: Vial of Dominance
title.flavour text: Blood, slaves and stone. The timeless edifice of Dominance.

title.name: Vial of Fate
title.flavour text: Ancient myths of flame, frost and thunder. Will we ever know the way forward?

title.name: Vial of Sacrifice
title.flavour text: Festivities of blood. Bleeding hearts and screaming lungs.

title.name: Vial of Summoning
title.flavour text: Call to place the demon gods of the past.

title.name: Vial of the Ghost
title.flavour text: With great tragedy and power, the dead are netted in anguish.

title.name: Vial of the Ritual
title.flavour text: The ritual creates order.  Both in the minds of men and gods.  The ritual creates order.

title.name: Vial of Transcendence
title.flavour text: It is not our flesh, our thoughts, or our soul that limits us; it is the distinction between them.

title.name: Visions of the Drowned
title.flavour text: Damp and bloated with water and goods. Sometimes treasure washes ashore.

title.name: Vital Transformation
title.flavour text: Blue tendrils envelop, breathing life into the beautifully inert.

title.name: Waiting in Ambush
title.flavour text: A chest of goods hides many challenges, but one goes unseen even to the wise.

title.name: Weeping Death
title.flavour text: Striding dryly through the mud, yet dripping with rot, he waits for the Mother's touch.

title.name: Wind and Thunder
title.flavour text: The dreaming fabric flutters and cracks in the wind like thunder. A sharp sound that freezes the blood.

title.name: Winter's Mournful Melodies
title.flavour text: A mournful hymn, a mournful soul, the chill of death on the wind.
